title: Natural Citrine Freeform - Citrine Crystal from Brazil - Nature's Artifacts
description: The Natural Citrine Freeform for Prosperity, Wealth and Abundance.
cleaned_text: The Natural Citrine Freeform is a perfect crystal; for use in Meditation or healing sessions, for jewelry, for display as home décor item or as a thoughtful gift for family and friends. Citrine greatly aids in emotional balancing, promotes motivation, encourages self-confidence, enhances concentration and revitalizes the mind. It transmutes negative energies from the environment and attracts positive vibrations for abundance in life. Citrine is called the "Success Stone" as it brings success and prosperity. Also known as the "Merchant's Stone" as it brings luck to business. Our supreme quality, freeform Natural Citrine, sourced from Brazil, will surely be a great addition to your product range!
